description: Musical performances of reggae master Bob Marley.
name: Bob Marley: Sun Is Shining - The Remixes

original_info.id: Bob Marley: Sun Is Shining: The Remixes_2000
original_info.name: Bob Marley: Sun Is Shining: The Remixes

review.name: Like a deaf, stammering Bob stuck in a Hip Hop Rave somewhere...
review.reviewBody: This was nothing like I expected. It's called a remix, but that is a rather liberal use of the word. Not a scratch of reggae anywhere. And the visuals are garage-quality clips of a small few folks dancing and such, interspersed with 70s-style effects and pictures of Bob. The only way I can see anyone enjoying this is to play as a DJ in some dance club that I can't ever imagine myself entering.
